thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Daniel

author: Daniel
title: Daniel
text: I recently moved from one city to another and had to give away a lot of my books in the process. I have slowly but surely been rebuilding through this company. They have so many good books under $5. I buy books from here, read them and often leave them in 'book-exchanges' to share with others. I'm grateful for this service. We have to keep real books alive - this place is helping to do that.
